sense.def:
To tuck one piece of clothing into another
pomeni potisniti prosto padajoče konce enega oblačila v drugo oblačilo.

seg.quote: I sat up and tucked my shirt into my shorts.

sense.def:
To tuck something somewhere
pomeni nekaj dati nekam, da je tam na varnem in dobro spravljeno.

seg.quote: He tucked the shell under his arm.

sense.def:
To tuck something away
pomeni nekaj shraniti na varnejši kraj.

cit.quote: spraviti na varno, dati na stran

seg.quote: She had a bit of money tucked away.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is tucked away
, je na mirnem kraju, kamor pride zelo malo ljudi.

seg.quote: The parish church is tucked away behind the cathedral.

sense.def:
To tuck someone in
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekdo udobno leži v postelji, in zatlačiti robove odej pod žimnico.

seg.quote: He was asleep before I tucked him in.

sense.def:
To tuck in one's shirt or blouse
pomeni zatlačiti prosto padajoče konce srajce ali bluze za hlače ali krilo.

To tuck in
pomeni nekaj jesti z velikim užitkom;

seg.quote: She was happily tucking into whatever dishes were put in front of her.
